mapper.select: select * from (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, PD_QUANTITY, GOODS_UNIT, MIN_ORDER_QUANTITY, MIN_ALARM_QUANTITY, PD_NAME, PD_PHONE, GOODS_PRICE, NATION FROM (SELECT GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, PD_QUANTITY, GOODS_UNIT, MIN_ORDER_QUANTITY, MIN_ALARM_QUANTITY, PD_NAME, PD_PHONE, GOODS_PRICE, NATION FROM TB_GOODS_${ id } LEFT JOIN TB_INVENTORY_${ id } USING (GOODS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCE_${ id } USING (GOODS_NO) WHERE ID = ${ id } ORDER BY GOODS_NO ASC)) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, PD_QUANTITY, GOODS_UNIT, MIN_ORDER_QUANTITY, MIN_ALARM_QUANTITY, PD_NAME, PD_PHONE, GOODS_PRICE, NATION FROM (SELECT GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, PD_QUANTITY, GOODS_UNIT, MIN_ORDER_QUANTITY, MIN_ALARM_QUANTITY, PD_NAME, PD_PHONE, GOODS_PRICE, NATION FROM TB_GOODS_${ id } LEFT JOIN TB_INVENTORY_${ id } USING (GOODS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCE_${ id } USING (GOODS_NO) WHERE ID = ${ id } AND GOODS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ORDER BY GOODS_NO ASC)) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_GOODS_${ id } LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCE_${ id } USING (GOODS_NO) WHERE PD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'

select * from (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, PD_QUANTITY, GOODS_UNIT, MIN_ORDER_QUANTITY, MIN_ALARM_QUANTITY, PD_NAME, PD_PHONE, GOODS_PRICE, NATION FROM (SELECT GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, PD_QUANTITY, GOODS_UNIT, MIN_ORDER_QUANTITY, MIN_ALARM_QUANTITY, PD_NAME, PD_PHONE, GOODS_PRICE, NATION FROM TB_GOODS_${ id } LEFT JOIN TB_INVENTORY_${ id } USING (GOODS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCE_${ id } USING (GOODS_NO) WHERE PD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' AND ID = ${ id } ORDER BY GOODS_NO ASC)) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
